description:
Mr. Wolfmann, Chup, Velouté, and friends visit Fidostein, watchdog of VamPIEr’s weakness: the silver stakes. Mr. Wolfmann and Fidostein are lifelong buddies; however VamPIEr, their former friend, is now their common enemy. The stakes are high as VamPIEr blocks passage to Vinegar’s Distillery.  Will the combined strength of heroes and canines beat VamPIEr?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gingin no Gin no Dangan Ignition
ギンギンの銀の弾丸イグニッション
